info.name: Transparency Platform Restful API - Balancing
info.description: Balancing endpoints from the Entso-e Transparency Platform Restful API.

item.name: Balancing

query.description: [M] EIC code of a Market Balancing Area (acquiring area)
[M] EIC code of a Market Balancing Area (connecting area)

request.description:
Data view page in Transparency Platform:

[https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r2/crossBorderBalancing/show](https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r2/crossBorderBalancing/show)

query.description: [M] EIC code of a Market Balance Area
[O] A95 = Frequency containment reserve; A96 = Automatic frequency restoration reserve; A97 = Manual frequency restoration reserve; A98 = Replacement reserve
[O] A04 = Generation; A05 = Load; A03 = Mixed

request.description:
Data view page in Transparency Platform:

[https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r2/activationAndActivatedBalancingReserves/show](https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r2/activationAndActivatedBalancingReserves/show)

query.description: [M] EIC code of a Market Balance Area
[O] A95 = Frequency containment reserve; A96 = Automatic frequency restoration reserve; A97 = Manual frequency restoration reserve; A98 = Replacement reserve
[O] A04 = Generation; A05 = Load; A03 = Mixed

request.description:
Data view page in Transparency Platform:

[https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r2/activationAndActivatedBalancingReserves/show](https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r2/activationAndActivatedBalancingReserves/show)

query.description: [M] A16	= Realised; A60 = Scheduled activation mFRR; A61 = Direct activation mFRR; A68 = Local Selection aFRR
[M] EIC Code of a LFA, IPA, or a SCA
[O] A95 = Frequency containment reserve; A96 = Automatic frequency restoration reserve; A97 = Manual frequency restoration reserve; A98 = Replacement reserve
[O] Note: This parameter is planned to be discontinued in R3.09 (October 2023)

request.description:
Data view page in Transparency Platform:

[https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r3/pricesOfActivatedBalancingEnergy/show](https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r3/pricesOfActivatedBalancingEnergy/show)

item.name: IF aFRR 3.16 Cross Border Marginal Prices (CBMPs) for aFRR Central Selection (CS)

query.description: [M] EIC code of a LFA, SCA, IPA

request.description:
Data view page in Transparency Platform:

[https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r3/cbmpsForAfrrStandardProduct/show](https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r3/cbmpsForAfrrStandardProduct/show)

query.description: [M] A46 = Replacement reserve; A47 = Manual frequency restoration reserve; A51 = Automatic frequency restoration reserve
[M] EIC code of a Scheduling Area
[M] Pattern yyyyMMddHHmm e.g. 201601010000. Note data is archived after 93 days of retention period. Therefore the requested date should be within the retention period.
[M] Pattern yyyyMMddHHmm e.g. 201601010000. Note data is archived after 93 days of retention period. Therefore the requested date should be within the retention period.
[O] Integer (allows downloading more than 100 documents. The offset ∈ [0,4800] so that paging is restricted to query for 4900 documents max., offset=n returns files in sequence between n+1 and n+100)
[O] A01 = Standard; A05 = Standard mFRR scheduled activation; A07 = Standard mFRR direct activation
[O] A02 = Specific; A03 = Integrated Process; A04 = Local

request.description:
Data view page in Transparency Platform:

[https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r3/bids/show](https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r3/bids/show)

query.description: [M] A46 = Replacement reserve; A47 = Manual frequency restoration reserve; A51 = Automatic frequency restoration reserve.
[M] EIC code of a Scheduling Area
[M] Pattern yyyyMMddHHmm e.g. 201601010000. Note data is archived after 93 days of retention period. Therefore the requested period should not be within the retention period.
[M] Pattern yyyyMMddHHmm e.g. 201601010000. Note data is archived after 93 days of retention period. Therefore the requested period should not be within the retention period.

request.description:
Data view page in Transparency Platform:

[https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r3/bids/show](https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r3/bids/show)

query.description: [M] EIC code of a Scheduling Area or LFA
[O] C40 = Conditional bid; C41 = Thermal limit; C42 = Frequency limit; C43 = Voltage limit; C44 = Current limit; C45 = Short-circuit current limits; C46 = Dynamic stability limit

request.description:
Data view page in Transparency Platform:

[https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r3/changesToBidAvailability/show](https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r3/changesToBidAvailability/show)

query.description: [M] A51 = Automatic frequency restoration reserve; A46 = Replacement reserve; A47 = Manual frequency restoration reserve; A60 = Scheduled activation mFRR;  A61 = Direct activation mFRR; A67 = Central Selection aFRR; A68 = Local Selection aFRR
[M] EIC code of a Scheduling Area
[M] B17 = Aggregated netted external TSO schedule document
[M] A60 = mFRR with Scheduled Activation; A61 = mFRR with Direct Activation; A51 = Automatic Frequency Restoration Reserve; A63= Imbalance Netting
[M] EIC code of a LFA or SCA
[M] EIC code of a LFA or SCA

request.description:
Data view page in Transparency Platform:

[https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r3/nettedVolumesAndNetPositions/show](https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r3/nettedVolumesAndNetPositions/show)

item.name: IFs 3.10, 3.16 & 3.17 Netted and Exchanged Volumes per Border

query.description: [M] A60 = mFRR with Scheduled Activation; A61 = mFRR with Direct Activation; A51 = Automatic Frequency Restoration Reserve; A63= Imbalance Netting
[M] EIC code of a LFA or SCA
[M] EIC code of a LFA or SCA

request.description:
Data view page in Transparency Platform:

[https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r3/nettedVolumesAndNetPositions/show](https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r3/nettedVolumesAndNetPositions/show)

query.description: [M] A51 = Automatic Frequency Restoration Reserve; A47 = Manual Frequency Restoration Reserve
[M] EIC code of a Scheduling Area

item.name: 17.1.B&C Volumes and Prices of Contracted Reserves

query.description: [M*] A51 = Automatic frequency restoration reserve; A52 =  Frequency containment reserve; A47 = Manual frequency restoration reserve; A46 = Replacement reserve
[M] A01 = Daily; A02 = Weekly; A03 = Monthly; A04 = Yearly; A06 = Long term; A13 = Hourly
[M] EIC code of a Scheduling Area
[O] A03 = Mixed; A04 = Generation; A05 = Load

[O] Integer (allows downloading more than 100 documents. The offset must belong to the range [0,4800] so that paging is restricted to query for 4900 documents max., offset=n returns files in sequence between n+1 and n+100)

request.description:
Data view page in Transparency Platform:

[https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r2/amountAndPricesPaidOfBalancingReservesUnderContract/show](https://transparency.entsoe.eu/balancing/r2/amountAndPricesPaidOfBalancingReservesUnderContract/show)

> \*Note: You can exclude the parameter processType from the request to retrieve data for all Reserve Types in 1 ZIP response.

query.description: [M] A15 = Acquiring system operator reserve schedule
[M] A46 = Replacement reserve; A47 = Manual frequency restoration reserve; A51 = Automatic frequency restoration reserve; A52 = Frequency containment reserve

[M ]Pattern yyyyMMddHHmm e.g. 201601010000 (IMPOTANT NOTE: Minimum time interval in query response ranges from part of day to year, depending on selected Type_MarketAgreement.Type. Minimum is 1 hour for this data item.)

[O] Integer (allows downloading more than 100 documents. The offset must belong to the range [0,4800] so that paging is restricted to query for 4900 documents max., offset=n returns files in sequence between n+1 and n+100)
[O] A01 = Daily; A02 = Weekly; A03 = Monthly; A04 = Yearly; A05 = Total; A06 = Long term; A07 = Intraday; A13 = Hourly

query.description: [M] A51 = Automatic Frequency Restoration Reserve; A63= Imbalance Netting; A47 = Manual frequency restoration reserve
[M] EIC code of a Scheduling Area or LFC area
[M] EIC code of a Scheduling Area or LFC area
[O] EIC of interconnector (If used, data for the given Transmission Asset is returned, otherwise, data for IC not specified is returned.)
